__e: There's a pirate known to fame
Stealing from a pirate who already stole is still stealing. It's not once removed.
These people have been victimized by Raiders and they deserve every bit of help we can give them.
Sorry... They're great, but you never really switch off, you know? (phone ringing, clears throat)
The Rear-Admiral was coming to get the pirates.
Traitor! How dare you betray us, pirate?
Our agreement was to find your pirate and get the hell out of here.
The others couldn't afford it. There's the kitchen in case you get hungry in the night.
It seems to me, Your Grace we have more to fear from the pirates already onboard.
Still, my dreams are haunted by the faces of those pirates that first captured me.
Round them up, take them back to the base and question them to see if they are pirates.
Evidently, humans have a similar capacity. This could be an important discovery.
I do not think these are Raiders, John.
They haven't got the slightest idea what they've really stolen.
Tell me, what kind of range do you figure those pirates have?
